nodes.bodyText: Please add the exclusion block on the conflicting org.json dependency so we are sure that it's not added to the classpath.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -58,7 +59,17 @@
 			<groupId>org.sagebionetworks</groupId>
 			<artifactId>simple-http-client</artifactId>
 		</dependency>
-
+		<!-- Force maven to use our modified version of json.org by including it 
+			before com.github.everit-org.json-schema which also depends on it. -->
+		<dependency>
+			<groupId>org.json</groupId>
+			<artifactId>JSON-Java</artifactId>
+		</dependency>
+		<!-- JSON schema validation library -->
+		<dependency>
+			<groupId>com.github.everit-org.json-schema</groupId>
+			<artifactId>org.everit.json.schema</artifactId>

nodes.bodyText: This might potentially be added to the root pom.xml in the dependency management section

nodes.bodyText: Could you renamed the class to SchemaTranslatorImpl.java
